meanings.sent1: The peahen laid eggs in the nest.
meanings.sent2: The peahen's feathers were not as colorful as the peacock's.
meanings.sent3: The peahen decided to start a fashion trend among the other birds.
meanings.sent4: She was the peahen of the office, always standing out with her unique style.
meanings.sent5: The peahen's gentle call echoed through the forest.

meanings.sent1: A group of peahens strutted gracefully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The peahen displayed her beauty during the mating season.
meanings.sent3: The peahen challenged the peacock to a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: She was the peahen of the group, always leading with elegance.
meanings.sent5: The peahen's presence added charm to the peacock's display.
